CustomField.formula: IF(Carrier__c = "Blue", "London ", IF(Carrier__c = "Red", "Continental ", IF(Carrier__c = "Purple", "Both ", "") ) ) + IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Carrier__c)), IMAGE( "/resource/train/train/colors/train_" + IF( Carrier__c = "Red", "red.png", IF( Carrier__c = "Blue", "blue.png", IF( Carrier__c = "Purple", "black.png", "" ) ) ), "Ticket color image" ), "" )
CustomField.label: Carrier Flag
